Thanks for filing the bug Eric.

Meantime, can you take a look at the below RFEs when you get a chance:

http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1514538&group_id=73833&atid=539102 
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1523276&group_id=73833&atid=539102

Good stuff,
St.Ack


Eric wrote:
> I'm running some TimespanCriteria right now and they seem fine.  I
> think the problem is if I edit the configuration of a crawl that has
> some TimespanCritera.  I just did so and got a new error from the "edit 
> configuration" page after I clicked "Finished".  Not sure if this would 
> happen if I paused the crawl first...  In any case, I registered these
> problems as bug #1526623
>
